org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block

Class BlockTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.ForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.AbstractBlock
        • net.minecraft.block.Block
          • net.minecraft.block.ContainerBlock
            • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block.BlockTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider, net.minecraft.util.IItemProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockTileGui

    public class BlockTile
extends net.minecraft.block.ContainerBlock
    Base block with a tile entity. By default, the NBT data of tile entities will not be persisted, unless enabled via isPersistNbt(). If so, then the getDroppedItemStackNbt(net.minecraft.block.BlockState, net.minecraft.util.math.RayTraceResult, net.minecraft.world.IBlockReader, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos, net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.tileentity.CyclopsTileEntity) method will be called to call CyclopsTileEntity.writeToItemStack(CompoundNBT). This NBT data will automatically be read when placing the block.

      • getDroppedItemStack

        protected net.minecraft.item.ItemStack getDroppedItemStack(net.minecraft.block.BlockState state,
                                                           net.minecraft.util.math.RayTraceResult target,
                                                           net.minecraft.world.IBlockReader world,
                                                           net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos blockPos,
                                                           net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                                           net.minecraft.item.ItemStack originalItemStack)
        Override this method to modify the stack that is dropped.
        Parameters:
        state - A block state.
        target - The ray trace result.
        world - The world.
        blockPos - The current position.
        player - The player breaking the block.
        originalItemStack - The original stack.
        Returns:
        The modified stack.

      • getDroppedItemStackNbt

        protected net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundNBT getDroppedItemStackNbt(net.minecraft.block.BlockState state,
                                                               net.minecraft.util.math.RayTraceResult target,
                                                               net.minecraft.world.IBlockReader world,
                                                               net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos blockPos,
                                                               net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                                               net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack,
                                                               CyclopsTileEntity tile)
        Override this method to modify how NBT is constructed for the item. By default, CyclopsTileEntity.writeToItemStack(CompoundNBT) will be called.
        Parameters:
        state - A block state.
        target - The ray trace result.
        world - The world.
        blockPos - The current position.
        player - The player breaking the block.
        itemStack - The item stack.
        tile - The tile entity to serialize.
        Returns:
        The NBT tag that will be added to the item stack.

      • isPersistNbt

        public boolean isPersistNbt()
        If the NBT data of this tile entity should be added to the dropped item.
        Returns:
        If the NBT data should be added.
